bibl.title: Tax Receipt from the praktores argyrikōn of Soknopaiou Nesos.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: This papyrus was edited as part of the International Seminar on the Cairo Papyri. Edition of P. Cair. Inv. 10441, recognised as the top left part of P. I.F.A.O. Inv. 317 (= S.B. VI, 9124). Dimeh (Soknopaiu Nesos), 208-10 CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Cair. Inv. 10441 + P. I.F.A.O. Inv. 317
Nicola Reggiani, Tax Receipt from the praktores argyrikōn of Soknopaiou Nesos.

This papyrus was edited as part of the International Seminar on the Cairo Papyri. Edition of P. Cair. Inv. 10441, recognised as the top left part of P. I.F.A.O. Inv. 317 (= S.B. VI, 9124). Dimeh (Soknopaiu Nesos), 208-10 CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
